body: General comment: Adding specializations and templating on more and more parameters bloats the binary code size quite significantly. We should avoid it and pass ndims (rank) as a runtime parameter wherever possible.
body_html: General comment: Adding specializations and templating on more and more parameters bloats the binary code size quite significantly. We should avoid it and pass ndims (rank) as a runtime parameter wherever possible.
body_text: General comment: Adding specializations and templating on more and more parameters bloats the binary code size quite significantly. We should avoid it and pass ndims (rank) as a runtime parameter wherever possible.
